name: dnHost
tag_list: hosting, web-hosting, domains, domain-name-registrar, website-builders, greece
overview:
Founded in Athens, Greece in 2000, dnHost is a provider of high-end shared, reseller, VPS, and dedicated web hosting. The company has 10 employees and owns or manages servers in 4 datacenters in Europe.

DnHost sets itself apart through quality customer service. Every day, the people who work at dnHost help dozens of customers with their domains, websites, e-shops and servers and provide some of the best service and support possible in Greece and Europe.

Our offerings include a variety of different domain name, website builders and web hosting solutions. We are an official .EU and .GR registrars and also provide .Com and dozens of other domain extensions. From business web hosting to shared web hosting, from VPS (virtual private server) hosting to managed dedicated server hosting, we have the expertise to provide the right solution to our customers.
